title: Commission Regulation (EEC) No 3658/91 of 16 December 1991 fixing the amount of the private storage aid for squid of the genus Loligo patagonica
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EEC) No 3658/91  of 16 December 1991  fixing the amount of the private storage aid for squid of the genus Loligo patagonica
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
1. The private storage aid referred to in Article 16 of Regulation (EEC) No 3796/81 is granted for the quantities offered for sale during the period 1 January to 30 June 1992, with the reservation that the conditions for the aid to come into  operation, as laid down in Article 16 (1) (a) of the said Regulation, are fulfilled during this period.
2. The amount of aid in respect of a maximum storage period of three months is fixed as follows:
Product  Amount of the storage aid (ecu/tonne net weight per month)     First month  Second and third months      Squid Loligo patagonica, whole, not cleaned  36  23

This Regulation shall enter into force on the date of its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
It shall apply with effect from 1 January 1992. This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 16 December 1991. For the Commission
Manuel MARĂN
Vice-President
(1) OJ No L 379, 31. 12. 1981, p. 1. (2) OJ No L 353, 17. 12. 1990, p. 10. (3) OJ No L 228, 5. 8. 1989, p. 10.
